13 class CollectPlanner : public PlannerForCommandType<CollectCommand> {
14 public:
15  enum CollectPathPlannerStates {
16  // From start of subbehavior to the start of the slow part of the
17  // approach
18  CourseApproach,
19  // From the slow part of the approach to the touching of the ball
20  FineApproach,
21  // From touching the ball to stopped with the ball in the mouth
22  Control
23  };
